text:
Even HN is not immune to miss information. A bad climate paper (so bad that googling the author leads to popular articles explaining what is wrong with that paper) is on the front page and even number one spot when I checked. <https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=26122209|https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=26122209> 

Sigh
Edit: It's flagged now.

elements.text: Even HN is not immune to miss information. A bad climate paper (so bad that googling the author leads to popular articles explaining what is wrong with that paper) is on the front page and even number one spot when I checked.

text: What made you think they were less prone to misinformation than average people in the first place?
